issue.title: [JS] Read dictionary-encoded vectors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-874](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-874). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the dictionary batch is just ignored - read it in and use it to understand dictionary encoded vectors

comments.body:
